title: Champion Mastery

embed.description: Grades Hover over your Champion Mastery points bar in the post-game screen and you'll see the grade that our new system gives you. Grades are awarded based on your overall performance in the role along with the champion you're playing and, crucially, where you're playing them.

body: I like seeing my progress on individual champions in pvp. But as i read and heared it, its of no use above lvl 5. When will we be rewarded wiv titles emotes and/or other stuff if we obtain a hier level? I've grown really attached to Cho'Gath. he is my fav champ to play. So it will rise above 5 soon(@3.5 now). was wondering what good it was if developement doesn't progress?

replies.body:
In the post you linked it says they will be unlocking more levels eventually (I have no idea when though). I know your levels don't progress right now past 5, but in your profile it does show your champion XP total. For example, here is a guy that has 200,000xp on Heimerdinger:

http://prntscr.com/7fihpl
If you make the levels up to say, 10, I have like 93k on Viktor, does that mean I'll go to level 10 automatically? Thanks!
